name: ByOwner
description: Post ads, Find, Buy and Rent things.
overview:
By Owner effectively and efficiently connects those that are seeking to hire, rent, apply or buy everything from services, rentals, jobs, properties, vehicles to everything else under the sun with those that are providing them. The website’s interface creates a visual impact with regards to the options that it offers, the details of which are all provided through ad postings that are uploaded by the private owners and service providers themselves.

Each category, whether it is real estate, rentals and vacation rentals, jobs, vehicles, items for sale or services, has easy-to-use drop down menus that can be used with a few clicks to narrow down the results according to exact preferences.

While searching for the kinds of jobs, properties, rentals or odds and ends that you are interested in on ByOwner, you can be rest assured that you will not be paying any commissions or additional fees, either to the website or to any sort of middlemen, sales agents, realtors or job placement agencies.

milestones.description: ByOwner recently migrated to new Website as on May 17, 2013.
